dataProtection.title: Personal Data Protection (GDPR)
dataProtection.content:
Hashguard is responsible for the processing of personal data carried out via its platform and respects your personal data in accordance with the GDPR. The data collected is used only to provide the services offered by Hashguard, such as account management, user support, and technical maintenance. In accordance with the GDPR, users have the following rights: right of access, rectification, and deletion of their personal data, right to data portability, right to limitation or opposition to processing. To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@hashguard.io. Personal data is kept for the duration necessary for the performance of the services or in accordance with legal obligations.

Data Portability: Users may request an exportable copy of their personal data or files stored on the platform. This request can be made at any time via privacy@hashguard.io.

security.title: Data Security and User Responsibility
security.content: Your data is stored in a decentralized and encrypted manner. The encryption keys required to access the data are generated locally by the user. Hashguard has no access or visibility into these keys. A 12-word recovery phrase (seedphrase) is provided at initialization. The user is required to keep it in a safe place to ensure access to their data. The user is solely responsible for the secure management of their keys and their seedphrase. In case of loss, Hashguard will not be able to restore access to the data. Hashguard implements zero-knowledge encryption, which means that we cannot access your encrypted data. It is crucial to keep your encryption keys and password safe, as they cannot be recovered if lost.
